resources.string: The server address could not be resolved. Please verify Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
The server response is invalid. Please verify your Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
Your username and password are not accepted. Please verify your authentication settings.
It seems that the server address is incorrect. Please verify your Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
An error occurred while trying to establish a SSL (https) connection with the server.
The connection to the server took too long to complete.
An error occurred while trying to communicate with the server.
This bookmark already exists. Retrieving the original bookmark to let you edit it.
This bookmark was not found on the server, it may have been already deleted.
